mapper.select: SELECT tn.*, mem_nickname, animal_name FROM market_${table_name} tn LEFT JOIN member mb ON tn.mem_no = mb.mem_no JOIN animal_category ac ON tn.animal_code = ac.animal_code WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO market_${table_name}(no, mem_no, animal_code, title, content) VALUES(seq_${table_name}.nextval, #{mem_no}, #{animal_code}, #{title}, #{content})
